rules_text: When Vitality Extractor enters the battlefield, you may tap an untapped land you control. If you do, create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“From earth and sea come steel and oil; from steel and oil come the holy word.”
—[/i]Phyrexian Scriptures[i][/i]
